en-US.summary: Quiz your knowledge of James Bond Movies
examplePhrases: Alexa start James Bond Movie Quiz
en-US.name: James Bond Movie Quiz
en-US.description: Alexa gives you hints about a James Bond movie until you can guess it

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: There's really only one 'mode' to the skill. Start a quiz and play until you get it or give up!
